titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony and legal representation in W. Curtis Shain v. Hunter Bates, et al.
A resolution to authorize testimony and legal representation in W. Curtis Shain v. Hunter Bates, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on March 3, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Authorizes Senator Mitch McConnell to provide testimony in the case of W. Curtis Shain v. G. Hunter Bates, et al, and authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent him in connection with such testimony.
